amendment.description: Insert before the period at the end the following: \ , and by adding, at the end, the following new section: \ "Sec. 120. Notwithstanding any other provision of this joint resolution, except section 107, $7,100,000 shall be available for obligation by the Administrator of General Services for expenses necessary to carry out the Presidential Transition Act of 1963 (3 U.S.C. 102 note).".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (FL) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
